mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (email, pwd, name, gender, birthday, hp, zipcode, addr1, addr2, regdate) VALUES (#{email}, md5(#{pwd}), #{name}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{hp}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT * FROM member WHERE email = #{email} AND pwd = md5(#{pwd})
SELECT * FROM member WHERE name=#{name} and hp=#{hp}
SELECT * FROM member WHERE name=#{name} and hp=#{hp} AND email = #{email}
